attributes.action: Proceed with the building of Ebw Vale Race track (Circuit of Wales)
attributes.background: Please sign petition to have the circuit if Wales race track be considered in parliament

rejection.details:
The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
